description.value:
The Dotted Sky
Â 
Dusk is the deity whose primary concern is the unknown that exists beyond the firmament of Aedenir. The inky black night sky, the stars, the void, and the sense of insignificance that comes from pondering this are all her domain. Followers of Dusk often perform acts of fortune telling, most notably by reading the celestial bodies and their alignments to provide omens to those who will listen. While belief that Aedenir is the center of the universe is dwindling since the Age of Recollection, this line of belief is considered blasphemous toward Dusk.

Edicts

  • Ponder the endless expanse beyond the world

Anathema

  • Believing Aedenir is the only thing in the universe

Areas of Concern

  • Fortune telling
  • The expanse beyond Aedenir
  • The insignificance of oneself in comparison to what is beyond
